attributes.action: Clamp down on holiday companies charging extortionate fees during school holiday
attributes.additional_details: Companies are hiking prices up so high during school holidays parents are forced to risk fines just so they can have quality much needed time with their children. We need government support to bring the prices down so children don't miss either much needed school or much needed quality time with their families
attributes.background: Parents are forced to take children out of school to be able to afford decent holidays and quality time with there children which incurs fines. The holiday companies shouldnt be allowed to ramp up prices at these times and should support hard working families

rejection.details: You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask Parliament to change the law, to make it illegal for holiday companies to increase their prices during school holidays.
